Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Ã¢â‚¬Å“My best advice is join an order early and get to know your members. You get an order bonus in player battles and bonuses to your realm cards when your order builds it. Plus, you can participate in events and earn powerful event-only cards.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
